constituent: cornerstone, stone, rock, grove, tree, wood, zoo, critters, tree2, wood2
heisigStory: This character depicts a cornerstone as a stone set at the end of a wildlife preserve (the "zoo in the grove").
koohiiStory1: Features like stones and groves of trees are the cornerstones of a happy zoo.
koohiiStory2: A zoo which is still under construction is already full of animals. At the moment, only the cornerstone has been set in place. To temporarily keep the animals from escaping, a closely-packed grove of small trees is planted around the stone. (Note that this zoo needs some serious mending.).
myStory: đá góc. viên đá đầu tiên quyết định cả khu vườn sẽ trông thế nào
